fields.name: start_time [hour-minute-second UTC]
fields.title: Time radiosonde turned on
fields.description: time at which the radiosonde was turned on [UTC]

fields.name: SLWC attached
fields.title: Radiosonde type
fields.description: "yes" if radiosonde was of type RSB with attached SLWC. "no" if radiosonde was of type ABx

fields.name: Success
fields.description: "yes" if radiosonde was launched successfully and reached above 10km height; "partly" if radiosonde was launched successfully, but the signal was lost before the radiosonde reached 10km or if some of the sensors failed; "no" if the launch was not successful
